 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/R9sGV7Tz60aniaUw5EPL3g/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/R9sGV7Tz60aniaUw5EPL3g/550566/DE3006318A5F587D5CD2E6F8B52B4694/2023_08_sdb_magazine_articolo1024x410_1.png> 	

AIR AND SEA FREIGHT UPDATES


Due to the recent events that took place over the weekend, the airspace in Iran, Iraq and Syria have been closed following the closure of Lebanese air space a few days prior. The air corridor from Europe to the UAE over Greece, Egypt, and KSA is safe and operational.

We expect to see further potential air space closures and openings in the coming days but at this point, the air trade in the East Arabian peninsula remains as normal.

metadata.doc_id: C377P2O - air & sea freight updates, promotion & rewards philosophy roadshows, chalhoub 30x30 has started,\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\C377P2O - air & sea freight updates, promotion & rewards philosophy roadshows, chalhoub 30x30 has started,\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
Due to the recent events that took place over the weekend, the airspace in Iran, Iraq and Syria have been closed following the closure of Lebanese air space a few days prior. The air corridor from Europe to the UAE over Greece, Egypt, and KSA is safe and operational.

We expect to see further potential air space closures and openings in the coming days but at this point, the air trade in the East Arabian peninsula remains as normal.

Sea transit times have extended due to the escalation near the Gulf of Aden forcing sealines to divert the vessels through the Cape of Good Hope. This will remain the same for some time. Coming from Asia, the shipping team has instructed freight forwarders to use only Chinese and Taiwanese sea liners (specially for KSA bound cargo). This translates in less departure frequencies and container space constraints.

Our shipping team strives to provide you with the fastest and safest route possible, however, you are encouraged to plan based on new transit reality and come to us to discuss potential options (particularly to KSA) on diverted routes.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/R9sGV7Tz60aniaUw5EPL3g/545531/F39BF051B4D76C917674C01CA4291FDD/nuggets-37.png> 	

PROMOTION & REWARDS PHILOSOPHY ROADSHOWS

Based on your feedback from the Voice of the People survey, we understand how important it is to have clarity around promotions and salary changes. Join a session to learn more about promotion policy, reward philosophy, salary structures, increase, and review cycle. D3 - Tues 12 Nov | 2:30pm - 4pm: Sign up to join

EARLY DETECTION SAVES LIVES!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/R9sGV7Tz60aniaUw5EPL3g/550471/9BC8682BC87E031778DD9A8799AD39A4/banner-3-73.png> 	

Early detection of breast cancer, when it's small and hasn't spread, makes treatment more effective and increases the chances of a full recovery.

Don't let a busy schedule stand in the way of your wellbeing. Take this proactive step and visit the free and private one-on-one clinical examinations by Dr. Sulaiman Al Habib Hospital in:

- HO2: Oct 30 from 10am - 5pm at Meeting Room FAAST
- HO1: Oct 31 from 10am - 5pm at Meeting Room Petra 1 - 1st Floor

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/R9sGV7Tz60aniaUw5EPL3g/549433/3313A052F911679EB07CAA448C355A00/untitled-design-55.png>

For monetary donations, you can donate in the link below and the amount will be deducted from your salary.

COFFEE WITH TRACEY

Last week, team members connected with Tracey Griffin, Chief Financial Officer, over coffee, where they discussed business opportunities, future goals, shared experiences, and networked in a casual environment. 

Look out for future opportunities to meet our leaders!

GIFT OF GIVING 2024

This year, our annual regional Gift of Giving campaign supported 16,417 students from low-income families. Through the efforts of over 500 volunteers we distributed school bags, stationary, reusable water bottles, smartboards, and laptops. Since the campaign's inception in 2010, we've positively impacted the lives of 169,494 students. 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/R9sGV7Tz60aniaUw5EPL3g/550563/DE1A3857AB4E4469091D9B52F01EE100/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-28.gif>

LAST 1 STANDING TRAIL RACE OFFER

Avail 15% off on the Last 1 Standing Trail Race on November 2nd, 2024, and make your steps count for Chalhoub 30x30! Choose between:

- 12hrs unlimited loops (7.4km/loop)
- 1 or 2 loops (7.4km/loop)

KIDS AROUND DUBAI MALL – OPENING SOON


 

Our Courcelles store is transforming into a Kids Around boutique and will be relocating on November 1st! The new store is next to Hamleys on the 2nd floor of Dubai Mall. Visit the new space and find all your favourite brands for your kids such as Givenchy, Boss, Chloé, Marc Jacobs, DKNY, Karl Lagerfeld, and many more!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/R9sGV7Tz60aniaUw5EPL3g/550567/1AA6AB8EA2E5A913F3BE062858AF2BFC/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-29.gif>
